location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Albert W Woods, College of Arms to Colonel Sir Lewis Pelly, KCB, KCSI

physicalDescription.extent: Watermark: The paper contains two watermarks - 'Brittanica' and 'Cansell, 1870'.

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing Pelly's warrant to accompany his having been appointed an ordinary member of the Civil division of the Second Class of Knights Commanders of the Honourable Order of the Bath. (Warrant no longer enclosed).
